籤詩版本二:
Ngequbuliso ileta yabhabha yaya esibhakabhakeni, yaza inqanawa ezele bubutyebi obuvela kwiNtaba iTai yabuya.
Ukuba ubuza malunga nohambo, iya kuba yinto enhle.Kusekho abantu abahloniphekileyo phambi kwakho abancomayo.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele impumelelo yodumo kunye nobutyebi.
Yonke into ihamba kakuhle.
解曰:
Ukuba ubuza malunga nodumo. Kukho umntu ohloniphekileyo phambi kwakho. Ukongeza uvuyo. Ubutyebi obuninzi.
Yonke into ihamba kakuhle ngolu phawu. Yanga ingahamba kakuhle.
籤詩故事一:
◇Wei Pei Yu Xian (Wei Pei Yu Xian)
U-Wei Pei, isifundiswa esihlwempuzekileyo, uphantse abe neminyaka engamashumi amane ubudala. Ngelixa wayekhokela idonki ukunqumla iBhulorho yaseLuoyang, umlobi owayekwibhulorho wayesele eza kubulala ufudo olukhulu ukuze aluthengise. Kodwa wayengenayo imali, ngoko wayitshintshisa idonki ngofudo waza wayikhulula phantsi kwebhulorho. Ukususela ngoko, u-Wei Pei waphumelela iimviwo zobukhosi kwaye wenyuselwa kwizinga eliphezulu.
(Eli bali lisebenzisa ingcamango yobugcisa yokuba "ufudo olukhulu lwadibana no-Wei Pei lwaza lwahlangulwa" ukuchaza lelotho. U-Wei Pei waba krelekrele ngenxa yoku, kuba wadibana nolu "fudo olukhulu".)
聖意: Ukuba indlu kunye nekhaya ziphambi kwakho, uya kuba nethamsanqa, kwaye uya kufuna ubutyebi, inhlanhla, ishishini kunye nemicimbi yomtshato.
古人: Wei Pei Yu Xian (Wei Pei Yu Xian)
